review: I watch all my tv through the apple tv now, all my videos are stored on an external drive connected to my mac, with itunes open my apple tv can read all the videos on the drive and plays them just fine.  I also use netflix occasionally and was even able to watch the presidential debates live on the wall street journal app that it comes with, also enjoy podcasts, specifically the rachel maddow one.  who needs cable when you have an apple tv.
author: B. Neilly

review: First let me start by saying i have the Roku in the basement and this for the bedroom TV. Simply put the Roku does more; like FREE streaming your entire library of music AND video via the Plex app. There are also way more channels for the Roku. With that said you also have to have itunes match to use the music from your mac. Just another apple product that nickel and dimes you for something that a competitor product does better.I am actually a little disappointed in this. BUT if you have match already and lots of movies on itunes i guess this will be just fine. Just saying though the Roku is a better and cheaper buy...
author: buckeyede06
